original_text: The first day of the festival when the Jews eat flat bread arrived. On this day, each family kills a young sheep for the Passover meal. Jesus' disciples said to him, ‘We will go to prepare the Passover meal for you. Where do you want us to do that?’
korean_text: 무교절의 첫날 곧 유월절 양 잡는 날에 제자들이 예수께 여짜오되 우리가 어디로 가서 선생님께서 유월절 음식을 잡수시게 준비하기를 원하시나이까 하매

sentences.original_text: The first day of the festival arrived
when the Jews eat flat bread
sentences.korean_translation: 유대인들이 누룩 없는 빵을 먹는 때에

sentences.original_text: each family kills a young sheep
We will go to prepare the Passover meal
Where do you want us to do that?
